column5: hi, going to be fishing with evergreen lodge late june. any info on hotel 105.. or anywhere else to stay close... thanks for your time wayne
Wayne, Hotel 105 is very neat and clean. Only 11 rooms I beleive. Give me a call if this is for a Friday night.
If that is full, try the Northside in Vermillion Bay, only about an hour away.

Try staying at Gold Pines for one night. Can't think of anything closer to Evergreen (i.e., they're right beside each other). Really, they should merge, give it all one name...better economies of scale that way. Hahaha... NWO Fishing Bum
I think you mean Golden Eagle. Actually, Evergreen owned the Golden Eagle camp and sold it about 5-6 years ago to Scott and Alma.
You may be right....there is so many of them up there at the northwest end, I sometimes mix them up. Either way, they're very close together. NWO Fishing Bum
the trillium motel is right in ear falls .pat at evergreen can give you more info.. GO MICHIGAN...GO BLUE
